messages.subject: Re: Unschoolers You Tube video
messages.msgSnippet: It was a wonderful talk and examination of the unschooled life.  The question and answer period was great too. There is also a series of videos on you tube
messages.messageBody:
It was a wonderful talk and examination of the unschooled life. The question and answer period was great too.

There is also a series of videos on you tube based on her book 'The Examined Life'. There is also some 'mock' videos, so you may have to do a little 'hunting'.

--- In UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com, "Connie J" <junecleaver58@...> wrote:
>
> I am certain many of you have
> seen this. However, I watched a wonderful You Tube video lecture by a young woman named Astra Taylor. It was so informative and such an encouragement when we have those doubting moments. She was unschooled.
>
> http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LwIyy1Fi-4Q
>
> ConnieJ
>

messages.subject: Unschoolers You Tube video
messages.msgSnippet: I am certain many of you have seen this. However, I watched a wonderful You Tube video lecture by a young woman named Astra Taylor. It was so informative and
messages.messageBody:
I am certain many of you have
seen this. However, I watched a wonderful You Tube video lecture by a young woman named Astra Taylor. It was so informative and such an encouragement when we have those doubting moments. She was unschooled.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LwIyy1Fi-4Q

ConnieJ
